original_title: The Fantastic Adventures of the Ugly Duckling
overview: Based on the famous tale by Hans Christian Andersen, the film tells the story of the Ugly Duckling. When he hatches in Mother Duck’s nest by mistake, everybody thinks he’s the ugliest duckling around. But in time he wins the hearts of all the animals on the farm - and at last becomes a beautiful swan.
title: The Fantastic Adventures of the Ugly Duckling
